cinemaArrange

类 CinemaDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinemaArrange.CinemaDirector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CinemaDirector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    includes all the arrangement and business of the theater in one day. Movies on show, showing arrangement and tickets that been sold. there's only one instance of that class in this program
    另请参阅:
    Screen, Arrange, Movie, 序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      java.util.ArrayList<Movie> allMovies
      includes all the movies
      java.util.ArrayList<Screen> allScreen
      configuration of all actions of movie rooms
      java.util.ArrayList<Arrange> difDayArran
      arrangement for the date

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUniqueDirector

        public static CinemaDirector getUniqueDirector()
        entrance of the public to call the theater manager unit
        返回:
        unique theater manager unit

      • setUniqueDirector

        public static void setUniqueDirector(CinemaDirector cd)
        set an unique theater manager unit(not build a new one)
        参数:
        cd - theater manager unit
        另请参阅:
        CinemaIO.readAllArrange()

      • getTheScreen

        public Screen getTheScreen(int index)
        clone a new theater, in which all the seats are available and don't point the same object as the theater already stored
        参数:
        index - number of the new theater starts from 0
        返回:
        new theater that manager wants
        另请参阅:
        Screen, Seat

      • getArrange

        public Arrange getArrange(int index)
        gain the arrangement of a specific day
        参数:
        index - the number of the day the manager wants, starts form 0, then 1
        返回:
        arrangement for specific day

      • NextDay

        public void NextDay()
        simulation of entering the next day

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel(java.lang.String tNum)
        cancel a ticket that already been sold
        参数:
        tNum - he number of the ticket that is wanted to be cancelled
        返回:
        true:success, false: fail
